result.name: investors-in-people-customer-relationship-management-database
result.notes: This dataset, which is updated daily, covers organisations at all stages of their Investors in People Journey (Lead, Working with, Accredited). It  provides details of customers since Investors in People's conception in 1991. Information is categorised in a number of ways, including economic sector, geographic region and organisational size.

organization.name: uk-commission-for-employment-and-skills
organization.title: UK Commission for Employment and Skills

result.title: Investors in People Customer Relationship Management database

extras.value: N/A Internal Use Only.  Due to the sensitive nature of this information and the fact that it was received in confidence, this information will not be released. The UK Commission for Employment and Skills considers that disclosure of this  information would be likely to prejudice commercial interests. To view a number of Investors of People customers, users may wish to visit the 'Resources' area of Investors in People website (http://www.investorsinpeople.co.uk/resources).
